title: The Star
description: The Star card shows a woman kneeling at the edge of a small pond. She is holding a container in each hand. One container is pouring water out onto the dry land, nourishing the land and the other container is pouring water into the small pond. The woman has one foot on the ground, representing her practical abilities, whilst the other foot is in the water, representing her intuition.There is a large central star surrounded by seven small stars which represent the chakras.
